description:
Hordy announces his plan for turning humans into slaves, the people of Fish-Man Island throw their support behind a new champion, and Luffy amazes even his own friends!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Big Clash! The Straw Hats vs. a Hundred Thousand Enemies!
Dai Gekitotsu! Mugiwara Ichimi vs 10 Man no Teki
Dans la mêlée ! L`équipage au chapeau de paille contres les 100 000 ennemis !
¡Un gran choque! Los piratas de Sombrero de Paja contra 100.000 enemigos
Грандиозное столкновение! Команда Мугивары против 100,000 противников!
صِدام كبير! طاقم قبّعة القشّ ضدّ مائة ألف عدوّ!
大激突! 麦わら一味VS10万の敵
